MS MCQs

    Complete the report request page in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. Can you create a Request Options Page for a new report?

      When you create a new report, a request page is created automatically for the report. This request page can’t be edited, except by using a special license.

      When you create a new report, you need to create a separate page object and link it to the report object for it to become the request page. Also, you can create custom options in the Request page.

      When you create a new report, a request page is created automatically for the report. Also, you can create custom options in the Request page. You design these options by using the Request Page section in the Report Object.

      When you create a new report, a request page is created automatically for the report. Also, you can create custom query options in the Request page. You design these options by using the Query Designer.


    2. Which of these buttons isn’t on a request page by default?

      Send to

      Print

      Preview

      Filter
